type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Light Up

---


[Block Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/light_up).

A block action that lights up furnaces, campfires and brewing stands.

Type ID: `apugli:light_up`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "block_action": {
        "type": "apugli:light_up_block",
        "burn_time": 2600,
        "brew_time": 20,
        "light_campfire": false,
        "particle": "minecraft:dragon_breath",
        "particle_count": 15,
        "sound": "minecraft:entity.ender_dragon.shoot"
    }
}
```
This block action lights up any furnace for 2600 ticks or fills a brewing stand. Successfully lighting a block releases 15 dragon breath particles from the block and will play an ender dragon shoot sound effect. This ignores campfires.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Light Up

---


[Block Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/light_up).

A block action that lights up furnaces, campfires and brewing stands.

Type ID: `apugli:light_up`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "block_action": {
        "type": "apugli:light_up_block",
        "burn_time": 2600,
        "brew_time": 20,
        "light_campfire": false,
        "particle": "minecraft:dragon_breath",
        "particle_count": 15,
        "sound": "minecraft:entity.ender_dragon.shoot"
    }
}
```
This block action lights up any furnace for 2600 ticks or fills a brewing stand. Successfully lighting a block releases 15 dragon breath particles from the block and will play an ender dragon shoot sound effect. This ignores campfires.

burn_time.description: The number of ticks that a furnace is lit for.
burn_time.markdownDescription: The number of ticks that a furnace is lit for.

brew_time.description: The amount of fuel given to a brewing stand upon use.
brew_time.markdownDescription: The amount of fuel given to a brewing stand upon use.

light_campfire.description: Whether this action should light up campfires.
light_campfire.markdownDescription: Whether this action should light up campfires.

particle.description: ID of the particle type to use.
particle.markdownDescription: ID of the particle type to use.

particle_count.description: The amount of particles to spawn when the block lights up.
particle_count.markdownDescription: The amount of particles to spawn when the block lights up.

sound.description: ID of the sound to play when the block lights up.
sound.markdownDescription: ID of the sound to play when the block lights up.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Light Up (Block Action Type) date: 2021-08-19

Light Up

Block Action Type.

A block action that lights up furnaces, campfires and brewing stands.

Type ID: apugli:light_up

Fields

Field Type Default Description
burn_time Integer 1600 The number of ticks that a furnace is lit for.
brew_time Integer 20 The amount of fuel given to a brewing stand upon use.
light_campfire Boolean true Whether this action should light up campfires.
particle Identifier optional ID of the particle type to use.
particle_count Integer optional The amount of particles to spawn when the block lights up.
sound Identifier optional ID of the sound to play when the block lights up.

Example

{
    "block_action": {
        "type": "apugli:light_up_block",
        "burn_time": 2600,
        "brew_time": 20,
        "light_campfire": false,
        "particle": "minecraft:dragon_breath",
        "particle_count": 15,
        "sound": "minecraft:entity.ender_dragon.shoot"
    }
}

This block action lights up any furnace for 2600 ticks or fills a brewing stand. Successfully lighting a block releases 15 dragon breath particles from the block and will play an ender dragon shoot sound effect. This ignores campfires.
